description.message: La synchronisation de navigateur telle qu'elle devrait être: sécurisée, anonyme et gratuite! Synchronisez vos favoris entre vos navigateurs et appareils, sans création de compte requise.

login_GetSyncId_Message.message: Download the xBrowserSync desktop browser extension available for Chrome and Firefox, create a new sync and then scan your sync ID QR code on the previous screen.

help_Page1_Chrome_Content.message:
Welcome to xBrowserSync

Browser syncing as it should be: secure, anonymous and free!

Before you begin, take some time to read through the following pages to familiarise yourself with xBrowserSync’s features, and if you have any questions be sure to check out the FAQs.

As xBrowserSync modifies your local browser data, make sure to back up your browser data and disable any active browser sync services (such as Google Chrome Sync) to avoid conflicts.

help_Page1_Firefox_Content.message:
Welcome to xBrowserSync

Browser syncing as it should be: secure, anonymous and free!

Before you begin, take some time to read through the following pages to familiarise yourself with xBrowserSync’s features, and if you have any questions be sure to check out the FAQs.

As xBrowserSync modifies your local browser data, make sure to back up your browser data and disable any active browser sync services (such as Firefox Sync) to avoid conflicts.

help_Page1_Android_Content.message:
Welcome to xBrowserSync

Browser syncing as it should be: secure, anonymous and free!

Before you begin, take some time to read through the following pages to familiarise yourself with xBrowserSync’s features, and if you have any questions be sure to check out the FAQs.

help_Page2_Desktop_Content.message:
Syncing for the first time

Before you can sync your browser data it must be encrypted so that only you can read it. Enter an encryption password, be sure to make it strong but also memorable — there are no resets or reminders so if you forget it you won’t be able to decrypt your synced data.

Once you click the Sync button your data will be encrypted and saved to the xBrowserSync service configured in the Settings panel.

Congratulations, you are now synced! Any changes you make to your local bookmarks will be synced automatically by xBrowserSync.

help_Page2_Android_Content.message:
Syncing for the first time

First things first, head over to your desktop browser and download the xBrowserSync extension (available for Chrome and Firefox).

When you create a new sync, your existing browser data will be encrypted locally and synced to the xBrowserSync service configured in the Settings panel.

Once you have synced your desktop browser data you can use your new sync ID to access your data here.

help_Page3_Content.message:
Your Sync ID

When you create a new sync you are given a unique sync ID which you can use along with your password to sync your data on other devices. Your anonymity is ensured as no personal data is collected or stored with your synced data.

This sync ID will only work with the xBrowserSync service on which it was created. Whenever you change services (via the Settings panel) you must create a new sync which will give you a new sync ID.

Once synced, you can view your sync ID in the Settings panel. Click it to reveal a handy QR code to scan when syncing on mobile devices.

help_Page4_Desktop_Content.message:
Retrieving an existing sync

Click on “Already got a sync ID?” to enter your existing sync ID and password. If you are synced to a different xBrowserSync service make sure it is configured in the Settings panel.

xBrowserSync will clear your local bookmarks before refreshing them from your synced data.

help_Page4_Android_Content.message:
Retrieving an existing sync

Click on “Already got a sync ID?” to enter your existing sync ID and password.

Rather than attempt to type the long sync ID, simply press the QR icon in the ID field and then scan the QR code for your sync ID (you can find it in the Settings panel of the desktop browser extension, click on your sync ID to reveal it).

If you are synced to a different xBrowserSync service make sure it is configured in the Settings panel.

help_Page5_Content.message:
Syncing to another service

By default your data is synced to the official xBrowserSync service, though anyone can run their own xBrowserSync service, either for private use (for ultimate security and privacy) or to make available for public use so that more people can enjoy xBrowserSync.

Check the list of public xBrowserSync services and configure which service to sync to in the Settings panel.

help_Page6_Desktop_Content.message:
Searching your bookmarks

Once synced, simply press Enter to display your recent bookmarks or type some keywords or a URL to search your bookmarks.

To edit or delete a bookmark, hover over the bookmark and click the now visible edit icon next to the bookmark’s title.

help_Page6_Android_Content.message:
Searching your bookmarks

Once synced, your bookmarks are displayed in chronological order when you open xBrowserSync. Type some keywords or a URL in the search box to search your bookmarks.

Long pressing on a bookmark will allow you to directly share, modify or delete the bookmark.

help_Page7_Desktop_Content.message:
Adding a bookmark

Bookmark the current page by clicking on the bookmark icon in the Search panel. The bookmark’s properties will be populated for you automatically, otherwise add a description and some tags to ensure better search results.

Alternatively, simply click the browser’s bookmark button as normal and xBrowserSync will automatically populate the bookmark’s properties (optional permissions must be granted for this to work, check the Settings panel).

help_Page7_Android_Content.message:
Adding a bookmark

Add bookmarks easily by sharing to xBrowserSync from any apps that share URLs such as browsers, YouTube, Spotify and many more.

The bookmark’s properties will be fetched for you, otherwise add a description and some tags to ensure better search results.

help_Page8_Chrome_Content.message:
Native features supported

Feel free to continue using your browser’s native bookmarking features such as the bookmarks bar and bookmarks manager, any changes you make will be synced automatically in the background.

If you have organised your existing bookmarks into folders don’t worry, xBrowserSync will respect and maintain your existing bookmarks hierarchy.

help_Page8_Firefox_Content.message:
Native features supported

Feel free to continue using your browser’s native bookmarking features such as the bookmarks toolbar and bookmarks library, any changes you make will be synced automatically in the background.

If you have organised your existing bookmarks into folders don’t worry, xBrowserSync will respect and maintain your existing bookmarks hierarchy.

Please note however, as Firefox’s bookmarks API does not yet support accessing native bookmark tags, any existing tags will be lost when syncing and tags added via xBrowserSync will not be saved as native tags.

help_Page9_Content.message:
Remember to back up

When you use xBrowserSync your data is your reponsibility so be smart and make sure to take backups.

You can do this easily in the Settings panel, you can back up your unencrypted data to a local file which can be used to restore your data should you need to.

help_Page10_Chrome_Content.message:
Use shortcuts!

To search your bookmarks quickly, use the default keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Space) to activate the extension, then simply press Enter to view your recent bookmarks or start typing to search.

To change the shortcut, browse to chrome://extensions/, the keyboard shortcuts option is at the bottom of the page.

help_Page10_Firefox_Content.message:
Use shortcuts!

To search your bookmarks quickly, use the default keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Space) to activate the extension, then simply press Enter to view your recent bookmarks or start typing to search.

To change the shortcut, browse to about:addons then click on “Manage Extension Shortcuts” in the Settings menu.

help_Page11_Desktop_Content.message:
Go mobile

Access your synced bookmarks on the move with the xBrowserSync Android app, available on Google Play store, F-Droid or direct download.

help_Page11_Android_Content.message:
Got desktop?

Sync your bookmarks across desktop and mobile devices by using the xBrowserSync desktop browser web extension alongside the mobile app.

Currently available for Chrome and Firefox, Opera support coming very soon.

help_Page12_Content.message:
Noticed an issue?

If you’ve found a bug in xBrowserSync or would like to request a new feature, head on over to GitHub and submit an issue.

Calling all coders! If you would like to help make xBrowserSync better, go ahead and fork the xBrowserSync GitHub repo and submit a pull request.

login_PasswordField_New_Description.message: Entrez un mot de passe de chiffrement

login_PasswordField_Existing_Description.message: Votre mot de passe de chiffrement

login_ConfirmSync_Message.message: Les données d'xBrowserSync vont écraser les données locales de votre navigateur. OK pour continuer?

login_DisableOtherSyncs_Message.message: Syncing your browser data with xBrowserSync whilst other browser sync tools (such as Google Chrome Sync) are active can lead to corrupted bookmarks. Please disable them before continuing.

login_UpgradeSync_Message.message:
This sync ID must be upgraded in order to sync with this version of xBrowserSync. After upgrading, you will not be able to sync with previous versions of xBrowserSync.

Ensure you have updated all of your xBrowserSync apps before continuing. Ready to proceed?

updated_Message.message: xBrowserSync has been updated with the latest features and fixes. For more details about the changes contained in this release, check out the release notes.

support_Message.message:
We want to make xBrowserSync the number one browser syncing tool, but there’s still a lot to do:

  • Add syncing of browser tabs and history
  • Support all popular desktop browsers
  • Support syncing to other cloud services such as Nextcloud, Dropbox, etc
  • Translate into other languages
  • And much, much more!

Only with your support can we continue to improve xBrowserSync and ensure that it remains an effective tool in protecting our privacy and productivity against the rot of big tech!

permissions_Message.message:
xBrowserSync automatically enriches bookmarks added using the browser’s Add Bookmark button with available metadata. To enable this, xBrowserSync requires additional permissions to be able to read visited website data.

Please indicate if prompted if you are happy to grant these permissions, alternatively you can add or remove permissions at any time in the Settings panel.

search_Field_Description.message: Commencez à taper pour trouver des favoris ou tapez juste la touche Entrée...

search_NoBookmarks_Message.message: Vous n'avez pas de favoris, ajoutez-en quelques-uns!

settings_Sync_SyncToolbarConfirmation_Me.message:
Activer la synchro de la barre de favoris va remplacer les favoris actuellement dans la barre de favoris par vos favoris synchronisés.

OK pour continuer ?

settings_Sync_ConfirmCancelSync_Message.message:
Une synchronisation est en cours, si vous continuez, vos données locales seront incomplètes.

OK pour continuer ?

settings_Sync_Id_Description.message: Utilisez votre ID pour synchroniser sur d'autres périphériques (cliquez pour un QR code).

settings_Sync_UpdatesAvailable_False_Mes.message: Local sync data is up to date.

settings_Sync_UpdatesAvailable_True_Mess.message: Sync updates available, next sync at

settings_Sync_SyncToolbar_Description.message: Désactiver ce paramètre si vous souhaitez afficher les favoris locaux dans la barre de favoris plutôt que les favoris synchronisés. Utile lorsque vous synchronisez à travers des navigateurs différents.

settings_Service_ChangeService_Descripti.message: Changer vers un autre service xBrowserSync.

settings_BackupRestore_BackupLocal_Descr.message: Sauvegarder les données locales dans un fichier.

settings_BackupRestore_BackupSynced_Desc.message: Sauvegarder les données synchronisées dans un fichier.

settings_BackupRestore_RestoreLocal_Desc.message: Restaurer les données locales depuis une sauvegarde.

settings_BackupRestore_RestoreSynced_Des.message: Restaurer les données synchronisées depuis une sauvegarder.

settings_About_AppVersion_Description.message: Numéro de version de l'extension xBrowserSync.

settings_Issues_Help_Description.message: Got a question or having an issue? Make sure to read through the help guide, otherwise the answer may be in the FAQs.

settings_About_Support_Description.message: If you enjoy using xBrowserSync consider supporting the project.

settings_Issues_Tracker_Description.message: Report an issue to report a bug or request a new feature.

settings_Issues_Log_Description.message: Download and include the application log when you log an issue.

settings_Issues_LogDownloaded_Message.message: If the log file does not download automatically, right click on the link below and 'Save link as...'.

settings_Permissions_ReadWebsiteData_Des.message: Required to automatically add metadata to bookmarks when using the browser’s native bookmark button (more info).

settings_Service_UpdateForm_Message.message: Entrez l'URL d'un service xBrowserSync alternatif. Parcourez la liste des services publics xBrowserSync ici.

settings_Service_UpdateForm_Confirm_Mess.message:
Après le changement de service, la synchronisation sera désactivée et vous devrez créer une nouvelle synchronisation.

Si vous avez déjà créer une synchronisation avec ce service et voulez récupérer vos données, utilisez l'ID xBrowserSync utilisé à l'époque.

OK pour continuer ?

settings_Service_UpdateForm_RequestFaile.message: Unable to connect to the service

settings_Service_UpdateForm_ServiceVersi.message: This service is running an unsupported API version

settings_BackupRestore_NotAvailable_Mess.message: Sauvegarder et restaurer seront accessibles une fois que vous serez synchronisés.

settings_BackupRestore_BackupSuccess_Mes.message: Si la sauvegarde ne se télécharge pas automatiquement, faites bouton droit sur le lien ci-dessous et cliquez sur 'Sauvegarder le lien en tant que...'.

settings_BackupRestore_RestoreForm_Messa.message: Copier le contenu d'une sauvegarde dans un fichier de restauration.

settings_Sync_NotAvailable_Message.message: Les paramètres de synchronisation seront disponibles une fois que vous serez synchronisés.

settings_Service_DataUsage_Description.message: Quantité de données utilisées sur le quota alloué par le service que vous utilisez.

settings_BackupRestore_ConfirmRestore_Sy.message:
Comme la synchro est actuellement activée, les données restaurées vont écraser les données synchronisés de xBrowserSync .

Pour restaurer vos données dans le navigateur locale seulement, désactivez la synchro avant de restaurer.

OK pour continuer ?

settings_BackupRestore_ConfirmRestore_No.message:
Comme la synchro est actuellement désactivée, les données restaurées vont écraser les données locales du navigateur.

OK pour continuer ?

qr_Message.message: Scan this QR code using the xBrowserSync Android app to access your synced data on your mobile device.

connRestored_Message.message: Vos modifications xBrowserSync ont été synchronisées.

error_Default_Message.message: Try again, if the problem persists click here to report an issue.

error_HttpRequestFailed_Message.message: Impossible de se connecter au service xBrowserSync, vérifiez le statut du service dans la panneau des Paramètres.

error_HttpRequestFailedWhileUpdating_Mes.message: La synchronisation sera retentée automatiquement lorsque la connexion sera restaurée.

error_TooManyRequests_Message.message: Sync has been disabled, re-enable sync to resume syncing.

error_RequestEntityTooLarge_Message.message: Impossible de synchroniser vos données car vous excédez le quota alloué par le service xBrowserSync. Supprimer quelques vieux favoris et reessayez de nouveau, ou changez de vers un service xBrowserSync different qui permet des synchros plus larges.

error_NotAcceptingNewSyncs_Title.message: Le Service n'accepte pas de nouvelles synchronisation

error_NotAcceptingNewSyncs_Message.message: Unable to create a new sync as the service is not currently accepting new syncs. If you have already created a sync using this service enter your sync ID, or use a different service.

error_DailyNewSyncLimitReached_Title.message: Limite quotidienne de nouvelles synchronisations atteinte

error_DailyNewSyncLimitReached_Message.message: Impossible de créer une nouvelle synchronisation car vous avez atteint la limite de synchronisation quotidienne pour ce service xBrowserSync. Synchronisez avec un ID xBrowserSync existant, choisissez un service différent ou essayez de nouveau demain.

error_MissingClientData_Message.message: Unable to find stored credentials. Re-enable sync and try again.

error_InvalidCredentials_Message.message: Check your sync ID and password, also make sure the current service is the same as where the sync was created.

error_SyncRemoved_Message.message: The requested sync does not exist on the service, it may have been removed due to inactivity. Create a new sync and restore your data from a backup.

error_NoDataToRestore_Message.message: Assurez vous d'avoir fourni une sauvegarde xBrowserSync valide avant de restaurer.

error_LocalSyncError_Message.message: An error occurred whilst syncing local changes. Your local bookmarks have now been refreshed so you may need to redo the previous change.

error_OutOfSync_Message.message: Local data was out of sync but has now been refreshed. Your local bookmarks have now been refreshed so you may need to redo the previous change.

error_ApiInvalid_Message.message: The selected service URL is not pointing to a valid xBrowserSync service.

error_ApiOffline_Message.message: The service is currently offline. Check the service status in the Settings panel for more information or try again later.

error_ApiVersionNotSupported_Message.message: This service is running an unsupported API version.

error_ContainerChanged_Title.message: Le dossier xBrowserSync a été modifié

error_ContainerChanged_Message.message: Modifying xBrowserSync [xbs] folders can cause sync issues. The previous change was not synced and your local bookmarks have been refreshed.

error_LocalContainerNotFound_Message.message: This could be caused by a corrupt browser profile. Try syncing with a fresh profile before importing any existing bookmarks.

error_FailedGetPageMetadata_Title.message: Impossible d'obtenir les metadate de l'URL

error_FailedGetPageMetadata_Message.message: L'URL est invalide ou les données de la page Web n'ont pas pu être récupérées.

error_SyncInterrupted_Message.message: Une précédente synchronisation a été interrompue et ne s'est pas complétée. Réactivez la synchronisation pour restaurer vos données synchronisées.

error_FailedRestoreData_Message.message: The backup data provided is not in an expected format.
